title: Iran Unveils New Drone, Missile As Tensions Rise In Middle East

title: Man Arrested In Italy Over Murder Of Two Australian Women In 1977

title: Polar Bear Appears In Iceland For 1st Time In 8 Years, Shot Dead By Police
content: A polar bear that made a rare appearance outside a cottage in a remote Icelandic village was shot by police after being deemed a threat to local residents.
summary: A polar bear that made a rare appearance outside a cottage in a remote Icelandic village was shot by police after being deemed a threat to local residents.

title: PM Modi Leaves For 3-Day US Visit, What's On Agenda: 10 Points

title: US Journalist Put On Leave Over Relationship With Robert Kennedy Jr

title: PM Modi's US Visit: Joe Biden To Host Quad Summit At His High School

title: Moo Deng: The Two-Month-Old Pygmy Hippo Who Has Become Internet Sensation
content: Moo Deng -- whose name in Thai means "bouncy pork", a popular snack -- is now an unwitting poster child for the endangered pygmy hippo.
summary: Moo Deng -- whose name in Thai means "bouncy pork", a popular snack -- is now an unwitting poster child for the endangered pygmy hippo.

title: Who Is Cristiana Barsony-Arcidiacono, Woman Tied To Beirut Pager Explosions
content: Cristiana Barsony-Arcidiacono, a 49-year-old Hungarian-Italian businesswoman, has found herself at the centre of international headlines following the explosion of pagers that killed 12 people and wounded over 2,000.
summary: Cristiana Barsony-Arcidiacono, a 49-year-old Hungarian-Italian businesswoman, has found herself at the centre of international headlines following the explosion of pagers that killed 12 people and wounded over 2,000.

title: NASA Reveals Sound Vibration Near A Black Hole 250 Million Light Years Away
content: Acoustic waves coming from near the black hole at the heart of the Perseus cluster of galaxies were transposed up 57 and 58 octaves in order to make them audible for human ears.
summary: Acoustic waves coming from near the black hole at the heart of the Perseus cluster of galaxies were transposed up 57 and 58 octaves in order to make them audible for human ears.

title: Wayanad To Oslo: Who Is Rinson Jose, Businessman Linked To Pager Blasts?
content: Rinson Jose, an Indian emigrant to Norway, has been linked to the Hezbollah pager blasts in Lebanon, which killed 12 people. Reports have suggested that Norta Global, a Bulgaria-based company owned by him, had a role in supplying the pagers.
summary: Rinson Jose, an Indian emigrant to Norway, has been linked to the Hezbollah pager blasts in Lebanon, which killed 12 people. Reports have suggested that Norta Global, a Bulgaria-based company owned by him, had a role in supplying the pagers.

title: Fighting Brazil Ban, Elon Musk's X Names Legal Representative
content: Brazilian law requires foreign companies to name a legal representative to operate in the country. The representative would assume the legal responsibilities for the firm locally.

title: Kerala-Born Man's Name Comes Up In Pager Blasts Case. What Probe Reveals

title: How CIA, Mossad Used A Computer Virus To Dismantle Iran's Nuclear Program
content: The story of Stuxnet's development and deployment began years earlier. The inception of Stuxnet can be traced back to the early 2000s, during a period of heightened tension between Iran and Western nations over Iran's nuclear ambitions.

title: China's "Beautiful Governor" Jailed Over Affairs With Subordinates, Bribes

title: Hezbollah And Hamas Leaders Assassinated So Far

title: Secret Service Found Guilty For Security Failure In Trump Assassination Bid
content: A new report has shown that the US Secret Service is responsible for security failures in the assassination attempt against former President Donald Trump at a rally in Pennsylvania on July 13, which led to one death and multiple injuries.
summary: A new report has shown that the US Secret Service is responsible for security failures in the assassination attempt against former President Donald Trump at a rally in Pennsylvania on July 13, which led to one death and multiple injuries.
